SKINNED DEEP

Starring Karoline Brandt, Liz Little, Warwick Davis, Jay Durge'

High energy horror takes center stage as TINA (Karoline Brandt) is held captive by a marauding tribe of vicious mutants led bythe sweet and unassuming GRANNY (Liz Little).

"The noose gets tighter when death is not an option."
